actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exempt from current taxation income earned in college savings accounts and to exempt permanently from taxation amounts from college savings accounts and from the redemption of qualified U.S. savings bonds used to pay college educational expenses.

summary.text: Family College Savings Act of 1989 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide a tax exclusion for qualified college savings accounts and for withdrawals from such accounts or redemptions of U.S. savings bonds used to pay higher and vocational education expenses.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exempt from current taxation income earned in college savings accounts and to exempt permanently from taxation amounts from college savings accounts and from the redemption of qualified U.S. savings bonds used to pay college educational expenses.
